name: Golden Goal 2022
description:
It's computer soccer! It's cool! It's for you and your friends!

A fun, classic game in the vein of FIFA, Sensible Soccer, and all the others! Playable for one or more players.

Made for my bachelor's graduation project at the Royal Danish Academy.

Note: The game works way, way better with controllers. Two players can use the keyboard if you really want:

Keyboard controls

Move: WASD
High Kick/Confirm: X
Direct Kick: C
Start/Pause: B

Move: Arrow Keys
High Kick/Confirm: L
Direct Kick: K
Start/Pause: Return
